page.title: 20THE TELEPHONE EXCHANGE.
page.content: {COMMUNICATIONS The telephone exchange has been in operation for 15 years.It is situated behind the new housing developement in Peterculter.This exchange caters for the area of Peterculter,Milltimber, Cults and other villages around this area. {OPERATIONS The telephone exchange works using electronics.A telephone number is dialed and a computer connects the caller to the receiver. {EMPLOYEES Three men work at the exchange.One works in the exchange itself checking for mechanical failures.The other two work outside checking telephones etc. {TRAVEL The employees all live in the vicinity,so travelling to work is no problem.
